full_text: Brazil's next government must fight corruption without bias, boost competitiveness and provide economic alternatives to deforestation in the Amazon https://t.co/TeCydXiG10

localize.full_text: ブラジルの次期政権は、偏りのない汚職の撲滅、競争力の強化、アマゾンでの森林伐採に代わる経済的手段の提供を求められる https://t.co/TeCydXiG10
